security_audit.summary: This is a pure content generation workflow skill with no security concerns. All 36 static findings are false positives caused by pattern matching errors. The static scanner misidentified YAML front matter, Chinese text, template placeholders, and the word 'Angle' as cryptographic algorithms or ransomware keywords. The skill contains only instructional text for content creation with no network access, filesystem operations, or code execution capabilities.

content.user_title: Create viral social media content with AI
content.value_statement: Transform raw ideas into high-impact viral content. This workflow combines structural thinking with human psychology insights to create scroll-stopping posts that drive engagement and shares.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes input material and routes to optimal content template from 4 types
Generates 3 content versions: viral style, deep insight style, and hybrid fusion
Creates 4 hook variations per content: counter-intuitive, pain-point, result-driven, suspense
Scores content potential across 4 dimensions with reasoning
Suggests optimal posting times based on content type
Provides structured markdown output with templates for easy customization
limitations: Does not publish content directly to social media platforms
Does not access real-time trending data or analytics
Requires user to provide source material or topic ideas as input
Output quality depends on input quality and specificity

use_cases.title: Boost engagement rates
use_cases.description: Social media managers can generate scroll-stopping posts that increase likes, comments, and shares using proven psychological triggers and structural frameworks.

use_cases.title: Accelerate content production
use_cases.description: Content creators can produce multiple content versions quickly to test what resonates with their audience and maintain consistent posting schedules.

use_cases.title: Create high-converting copy
use_cases.description: Digital marketers can transform product features into emotionally compelling narratives that drive action and improve conversion rates.

prompt_templates.title: Basic content request
prompt_templates.prompt: Please help me create viral content based on this material: [insert your material or topic]
prompt_templates.scenario: Create a simple post from raw material

prompt_templates.title: Specific template selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Please use the T1 hot topic template to create content based on this news: [insert news content]
prompt_templates.scenario: Target a specific content type for trending topics

prompt_templates.title: Detailed angle with audience
prompt_templates.prompt: My target audience is [describe audience]. Please use the T4 practical value template based on this experience: [insert your experience/method]
prompt_templates.scenario: Provide detailed context for audience-specific content

prompt_templates.title: Full workflow execution
prompt_templates.prompt: Please execute the complete Defou x Stanley workflow based on this material: [insert material]. Generate routing analysis, three content versions, hooks, and publishing recommendations.
prompt_templates.scenario: Generate complete content package with all variations

output_examples.output:
Routing: T2 Counter-motivational type
Best angle: Knowledge payment is essentially anxiety tax
Version A highlight: Minimalist punchline - You bought psychological comfort, not just a course
Version B depth: Deconstruct the learning illusion psychological mechanism
Version C fusion: Combines virality with deep thinking
Recommended posting time: Friday 8pm (weekend reflection peak)

output_examples.input: Popular influencer couple broke up after 5 years
output_examples.output:
Routing: T1 Hot topic leverage type
Best angle: Love cannot resist structural inequality
Version A highlight: Opens with shocking data about breakup economics
Version B depth: Analyzes relationship power dynamics and financial dependence
Version C fusion: Emotional hook with systemic analysis
Recommended posting time: Tuesday 9pm (prime discussion hours)

best_practices: Provide specific material with real numbers, dates, or concrete events for stronger content output
Clearly state your target audience to help the router match the best template type
Review all 3 versions and combine elements that resonate most with your audience needs
anti_patterns: Vague inputs like help me write viral content without context produce generic output
Avoid sharing sensitive personal information in source material as it may appear in generated content
Do not rely solely on AI output without human review for brand voice consistency and accuracy

faq.question: What are the T1, T2, T3, T4 templates?
faq.answer: These are four content frameworks: T1 for hot topic leverage, T2 for counter-motivational insights, T3 for humorous observations, and T4 for practical value sharing. The skill automatically routes your input to the best match.

faq.question: Can this publish directly to social media?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates content drafts only. You must manually copy and paste the output to your preferred social media platform.

faq.question: What languages does it support?
faq.answer: The skill is optimized for Chinese content creation. You can adapt the templates for other languages by modifying the prompt instructions.

faq.question: How many content versions does it generate?
faq.answer: Three versions per request: Viral Stanley style focused on engagement, Deep Defou style focused on insights, and a fusion combo version that balances both approaches.

faq.question: Is the generated content unique?
faq.answer: Yes, all content is AI-generated based on your specific input. No external sources are scraped or referenced. The output is original creative work.

faq.question: Can I use this for business marketing?
faq.answer: Yes, the T4 template is specifically designed for business content including product promotion, lead generation, and sharing monetization strategies.
